group_1.narration: ―Juri―@Oi, what are you...
―Yuna―@You were...@about to kill yourself just now, weren't you?!
―Juri―@You kiddin' me? Juri the Great, doin' something like that?@No way. What are you, stupid?
―Yuna―@Do you really think our relationship is one@where you can pull the wool over my eyes, Juri...?
―Juri―@...
―Yuna―@Tell me the truth...
―Juri―@Okay, fine.@I was tryin' to shatter my own Soul Gem.
―Juri―@...To be honest, havin' me out of the picture@would be a huge plus for Futatsugi right now.
―Yuna―@What are you talking about...?
―Juri―@I've always been a troublemaker,@and I can't control my power when it builds up.
―Juri―@When our fight with Kamihama is done,@I knew I'd wanna try to kill you again.
―Juri―@You're tryin' to hold everything together,@and I'm just getting in the way.
―Yuna―@The old you didn't care about that sort of thing.@Why the sudden change of character?
―Juri―@Mikazuki's Mightiest told me herself.
―Juri―@As long as Juri the Great exists,@there's never gonna be a world without conflict.
―Juri―@'Cause if there are people lookin' to start shit,@there's never gonna be peace.
―Yuna―@I suppose that's true...@But you shouldn't just roll over and take it...
―Juri―@I would've been fine with it before,@but now there are too many people I consider friends.
―Juri―@Up 'til now, it hadn't been a problem to run wild in Futatsugi,@where the strong eat the weak.
―Juri―@But you guys brought that time to an end,@and now everyone's comin' together for real.
―Juri―@It ain't a matter of today's friends becomin' tomorrow's enemies.@It means a new era is comin'.
―Juri―@If I turn on you and go wild by myself,@all that'll be left is our friends' misery.
―Juri―@With times changin', there's no need for me anymore. Sooner@or later, Ryuugasaki's heart will be gone, and that's alright.
―Yuna―@You may be reckless, but you've won the hearts of Ryuugasaki.@Now is not the time to die.
―Yuna―@If you disappear, Futatsugi will be thrown@off balance and descend into chaos again.
―Yuna―@Plus, if Ao truly does defect, we'll have more@than just the Purification System to deal with.
―Juri―@What's the point in keeping me around?@You're payin' this more trouble than it's worth.
―Juri―@And what about my unquenchable fire?
―Juri―@Now that the days of freely@rampagin' to survive are over...
―Juri―@I can't fight if I don't got a reason.
―Yuna―@Then at the very least,@we can fight for Ao's sake.
―Juri―@Eh?
―Yuna―@It's not merely the [textYellow:Kimochi] that warped her.
―Yuna―@She's been broken because of@the history we created...
―Yuna―@So that will be our reason to fight from now on:@to save her.

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright, gotcha.@Guess I'll do that before I die.

group_1.textRight: Yes. If you're going to die, at least die saving Ao...
But why did you choose to kill@yourself here, of all places?

group_1.textLeft: 'Cause I didn't wanna turn into a Witch.
I wanted to make sure I@would've destroyed my soul.
Anyway, I'm sure you got your own@business to take care of, don't you?
I ain't gonna kill myself. You go on ahead.
If you wanna take down Lil' Sis,@I'll tag along with ya.

group_1.textRight: ...Wait here until I've finished what I need to do.
There's somewhere I want to visit before we leave.
